house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1977 has 4 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, patio, fireplace, storage space.
house_listing.firm_name: Century 21 Centre' Point R E Century 21 Centre' Point R E
